name: Bald Jhon Demo
description:
Bald jhon is a 2D platformer where in some levels you will need to touch all platforms and in others just need to reach the goal.

=====INSTRUCTIONS====

Use W, S, A, D to move the player.

=====Characters Emojis=====

Characters will have emojis on their heads to help you to identify who is an enemy, who is a friendly NPC or who is an Invulnerable enemy.

Invulnerable enemies only can be defeated if the player picks the invulnerable ITEM.

Sprites sheets are from Grafxkid
